title: 49. You have three gcloud configurations – one for each of development, test and production projects. You want to list all the configurations and switch to a new configuration. With the fewest steps possible, what’s the fastest way to switch to the correct configuration?
alternatives: A. To list configurations gcloud config configurations list To activate a configuration – gcloud config configurations activate.
B. To list configurations gcloud config list To activate a configuration – gcloud config activate.
C. To list configurations – gcloud configurations list To activate a configuration gcloud config activate.
D. To list configurations – gcloud configurations list To activate a configuration goloud configurations activate
